summary: Fixed multiple responsive issues: Blog section slider, Hero search gap, Features padding, Career Paths link visibility, Super App subtitle color, AI Bot order, and started Testimonials slider. Still need to complete testimonial-card component and fix Popular Courses/Instagram mobile layouts.
current_status: In progress: fixing responsive design issues for mobile viewports. Blog slider implemented, AI Bot order fixed, Super App subtitle colored. Remaining: testimonial-card component, Popular Courses mobile layout, Instagram mobile layout.
